title: [K-12] Rubric-Based Reading Comprehension Assessment Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic reading strategies and text analysis skills
context.additional_context: Learners are required to possess graduate-level language analysis skills and experience formative assessment through participation in the design of evaluation tools. Collaborative learning utilizing digital devices is conducted in a real-time online environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design reading comprehension assessment items by analyzing rubric evaluation criteria.
Learners can perform rubric-based self-assessment and peer assessment on the given text.
Learners can develop a reading strategy improvement plan based on assessment results.

resources: Text Materials of Varying Difficulty Levels

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
